page.title: 11The Sorts of Food We Eat.
page.content: BREAKFAST:from Fruit Juice, Toast, Cereal(e.g.Frosties, Rice Crispies, Shredded Wheat, Weetabix, Porridge, Cornflakes and Branflakes), Egg and Bacon, Boiled Egg, Fried Bread. SCHOOL LUNCH:from Sandwiches, Fruit, Packet of Crisps, or Beefburger, Chips, Baked Beans, Milk Shake, Mashed Potato, Sausages, Beans, Jam Roly Poly and Jam Doughnuts. DINNER:from Meat(e.g.Lamb, Chicken, Beef, Duck, Pork and Veal), Potatoes, Salad, Fish and Chips, Peas, Shepherds Pie, Steak and Kidney Pie. DESSERTS:e.g. Ice Cream, Apple Crumble, Apple Pie, Strawberries and Cream, Cheesecake, Strawberry Flan and Trifle. CHILDREN'S FAVORITES: Fizzy Drinks, Sweets, Chocolate, Ice Lollies, Cakes, Ice Cream Cornet, Ice Chocs, Biscuits, Packet of Crisps, Chips, Hot Dogs, Beefburgers, Pizza and Fish and Chips.
